TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCStopGrid extends Cocos2D.CCActionInstant

Docs.remarks: <para> <para>Don't call this action if another grid action is active. Call if you want to remove the the grid effect. Example: Sequence::actions(Lens::action(...), StopGrid::action(...), NULL); </para> </para><para>Don't call this action if another grid action is active.
